page.title: 05SURVEY OF EMPLOYMENT
page.content: SURVEY OF{EMPLOYMENT}IN NEWCASTLETON. {-Douglas Square}is 0% because farmers usually work on or near the farm. 3.{Urban}:Most of the parents at Newcastleton School are{employed}in town in factories,shops and banks,the percentage of the parents working in the town is 54%, 65% of the people in {Douglas Square}are working in{Urban. 4.{Unemployed:}Only 4% of the parents are{unemployed},none of the people in {Douglas Square}are{unemployed. 5.{Retired:}19% of the people in {Douglas Square}are{retired}this is a high percentage.
